Tammy: (Laughing)

Tammy: Well, I said "baby-sit,"

Beth: Tammy, come on. I'm trying to...

Beth: Well, let's hope not.

Tammy: Lizzie tricked Coop into staying, and

Beth: You know what, Tammy...

Tammy: So you know what? Karma is not my

Alan: You know,

Alan: I will not take "no" for an

Lillian: I've lived here for quite a long

Lillian: If you mess with that child, all

Reva: Well, you know. She... you both did a

Reva: Oh, I know, scheduling, everybody else

Josh: Well, no, actually I meant, you know,
this time of year it can be lonely for some people. It's a busy time, and it's funny how sometimes at your busiest time, you... you
know what I'm saying.
Reva: No, no. What are you saying, Josh?
Josh: What do you mean?

Reva: I just told you that I was good. You
asked me how I was, I said, "I'm busy," and now all of a sudden busy

Josh: No, you're reading that into it.
Reva: I don't think so.

Josh: Okay, all right, here's the thing.
Cassie asked me to check in on you.
Reva: No, she asked you to check up on me.

Josh: Well, it's the first time that the
three of us have been together in a setting like this...

Reva: Joshua. I'm not lonely. I'm not
depressed. I beat cancer and I have a new grandchild. Tell Cassie not to worry.
Josh: Okay. Don't be upset.
Reva: I'm not.

Josh: Good. It's just a lot of things have
changed for all of us.

Reva: (Laughs) That's
for sure.
Cal: (Clears throat)

Reva: Yeah, thanks. I'm sorry,
you haven't met my sister's boyfriend, Josh Lewis.

Josh: Thank you. It's nice to have you here.
Cal: Nice party.
Josh: Thank you.
Reva: We were just talking about chess.

Reva: Yeah, well, that's because you've been
busy.
Cal: Could I talk to you for a minute?
Reva: Sure.
Josh: No problem.
Reva: Is everything okay?

Reva: No, no, it's okay. It happens.
Cal: Can I get you a ride or...
Reva: No, I'm going with you.

Marina: Well, you look like you're going to be sick.
